item.title: GENOS to participate in the BioLeap Accelerator Program's Inaugural Cohort
item.dc:creator: GENOS
item.content:encoded: SAN JUAN, PUERTO RICO – Ozcorp Scientific, a Puerto Rico based biotech venture studio, is proud to announce that GENOS, one of its recently debuted portfolio companies, has been selected to join the inaugural cohort of the BioLeap Life Science Startup Accelerator Program. GENOS is a bioinformatics-as-a-service company providing innovative solutions to streamline research and development processes in life sciences.

item.title: Ozcorp Scientific Unveils GENOS to Propel Biotechnology Research Through Tailored Bioinformatics Services
item.dc:creator: GENOS
item.content:encoded: SAN JUAN, PUERTO RICO – Ozcorp Scientific, a biotech venture studio, proudly announces the official emergence of GENOS, marking its decisive step out of stealth-mode and into the limelight of pioneering bioinformatics solutions. Spearheaded by Dr. Osvaldo D. Rivera, a Bioinformatics Scientist and Cancer Cell Biologist, GENOS aims to revolutionize the landscape of bioinformatics services by providing accessible solutions to investigator's most complex projects and biological data hurdles. GENOS is positioned strategically within Puerto Rico, a recently designated Tech Hub to spur American innovation in biotechnologies, biopharmaceuticals and medical device manufacturing.
